/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with buildings on both sides, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban landscape and the natural elements within it. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, emphasizing the vastness of the cityscape.
